type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
Exalted [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
[i]Awakening[/i] – When Chrom, Newly Exalted enters, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Chrom attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, Chrom and that creature get +1/+1 for each permanent you control with exalted.
